name: Dick Cheney
role: Vice President of the United States
summary: Former Vice President under George W. Bush who called Trump the 'greatest threat to our republic' and endorsed Kamala Harris.

keyStatements.quote: In our nation's 246-year history, there has never been an individual who is a greater threat to our republic than Donald Trump.
He tried to steal the last election using lies and violence to keep himself in power after the voters had rejected him. He is a coward. A real man wouldn't lie to his supporters.

In our nation's history, there has never been an individual who is a greater threat to our republic than Donald Trump. He tried to steal the last election using lies and violence to keep himself in power after the voters had rejected him. He's a coward.
keyStatements.context: Announcing he will vote for Kamala Harris

timeline.event: Called Trump greatest threat to republic
timeline.significance: Unprecedented criticism from former GOP VP

timeline.event: Announced he will vote for Kamala Harris
timeline.significance: Former Republican VP crossing party lines

credibility.background: Former Vice President, Secretary of Defense, White House Chief of Staff, six-term Congressman
positions: Vice President of the United States (2001-2009)

oppositionReasons: Trump is the greatest threat to the republic in U.S. history
Trump tried to steal the 2020 election
Trump used lies and violence to stay in power
Trump is a coward who lies to supporters
endorsement: Endorsed Kamala Harris for President in 2024

sources.title: Dick Cheney attacks Donald Trump as 'greatest threat to our republic'
Dick Cheney says he will vote for Harris
